statistics: Fast and Numerically Stable Statistical Analysis Utilities.
nlp-utils: NLP Functions for amplifying negations, managing elisions, creating ngrams, stems, phonetic codes to tokens and more.
tokenizer: Multilingual tokenizer that automatically tags each token with its type such as word, email, time or hashtag.
naive-bayes-text-classifier: Configurable Naive Bayes Classifier for text with cross-validation support.
sentiment: Accurate and fast sentiment scoring of phrases with emoticons & emojis.
porter2-stemmer: Javascript Implementation of Porter Stemmer Algorithm V2 by Dr Martin F Porter.
regression-tree: Decision Tree to predict the value of a continuous target variable.
bm25-text-search: Fast Full Text Search based on BM25.
distance: Distance/Similarity functions for Bag of Words, Strings, Vectors and more.
jaro-distance: An Implementation of Jaro Distance Algorithm by Matthew A. Jaro.
helpers: Helper functions for Javascript arrays and objects.
